title: Nerf too stronk?
body:
Dear rito

I only play aram these days, and I agree with your decision to nerf healing abilities on the bridge of death. They really were just bullies. However, after playing a bunch of games today and yesterday as Janna and Raka, I kind of feel like you have over-corrected a little. I just kind of feel like they are a little unviable now, as opposed to being ridiculous powerhouses. Since this is a new thing, it possibly wants a little tweaking. Just my thoughts...

Keep up the great work x

replies.body: This does not belong in the Help and Support boards. Go over to the Misc. boards for stuff like this.
